text: 12|46|(avan yusuphinre atutt cenn parannu:) he, satyasandhanaya yusuphâ€Œ, taticc kealutta el pasukkale el melinna pasukkal tinnunna karyattilum el paccakkatirukaluteyum vere el unanniya katirukaluteyum karyattilum tankal nannalkku vidhi parannutaranam. janannal ariyuvanayi a vivaravum keant enikk avarute atuttekk matannamallea
